item.description:
You won't believe you eyes when so many people go up on stage acting like chickens and doing all kinds of fun and wild stuff!

Jerry Valley has been featured worldwide and by special arrangement he is appearing in-person at the Sahara Club in Methuen.

There is also a special guest star Leah Hilton appearing.

He has been on TV's "20/20", Las Vegas, and cruise ships

You may have heard of him before.

NOTE: The show actually starts at 9:00 PM

***This Show is a Five-Star Rating***

(Reservations are usually recommended, but I will reserve space for us as the 'yeses' come in until space is still available.)

I scheduled the Meet Up at 8:00 so we can have a light dinner and drinks and meet, etc.
(Tickets are only $10 at the door.)

The food is Middle Eastern.

Hope to see you there for a blast and great chance to meet and end the week and begin the week end!
item.name: CAPTIVATING HYPNOTIST/COMEDY SHOW! (Friday)
